typeProperties.command:
.append Temp_SelectedJob with(tags='["test"]') <|
    CIS_Metadata_Job
    | where Workflow in ('BootstrapDCSeedingServerWorkflow', 'CreateVMandJoinDomainWorkflow', 'SetupCASeedServerWorkflow') and ParentId != '' and ParentId == RootId
    | join kind=inner WorkloadMapping
        on DisplayName
    | project JobId, ParentId, RootId, DisplayName, Cloud, Tenant, ServiceHostCapability,
        CreatedDate, StartDate, FinishDate, StateName, PackageId, Workflow, HostName, ServiceHostLocation,
        Timestamp, Notes, IsBlockingPathCandidate, IsBlockingPathPresent, ComponentOwnerId, OwningTeamId,
        Client, ParametersJson, SettingsJson, MdmId, TotalTaskCount, FinishedTaskCount, BlockedTaskCount,
        FinishTaskPercentage=1.0 * FinishedTaskCount/TotalTaskCount, FinishTaskProgress=strcat(FinishedTaskCount,"/",TotalTaskCount), 
        WorkflowName=Workflow, WorkloadDisplay, WorkloadName

.create-merge table Temp_SelectedJob (JobId:string, ParentId:string, RootId:string, DisplayName:string, Cloud:string, Tenant:string, ServiceHostCapability:string, CreatedDate:datetime, StartDate:datetime, FinishDate:datetime, StateName:string, PackageId:string, Workflow:string, HostName:string, ServiceHostLocation:string, Timestamp:datetime, Notes:string, IsBlockingPathCandidate:string, IsBlockingPathPresent:string, ComponentOwnerId:string, OwningTeamId:string, Client:string, ParametersJson:string, SettingsJson:string, MdmId:string, TotalTaskCount:int, FinishedTaskCount:int, BlockedTaskCount:int, FinishTaskPercentage:real, FinishTaskProgress:string, WorkflowName:string, WorkloadDisplay:string, WorkloadName:string)
